title: Forests of Ithilien (4R121)
text:
Set:	The Two Towers
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Gondor
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Plays to your support area. While the fellowship is at site 5T, the site number of each Man in a skirmish is +2. Regroup: Discard this condition and exert a Ring-bound Man to liberate a site.
Lore:	”…a fair country of climbing woods and swift-falling streams.”
Rarity:	R
